name: Quagsire
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: This carefree Pokémon has an easygoing nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.

abilities.name: Wash Out
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a {W} Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon.
